name: Caterpillar (itch) (bosaku)
description:
Experience the rigorous struggle of our natural world as you join this lone caterpillar in the climb for life. Experience this world through the caterpillar's eyes, bright and vivid, majestic and death defying, dangerous yet serene... Will you make it to the top of the world with your caterpillar friend?

We never quite got around to making this game very interactible, with obstacles etc. We might revisit it and add more plants and routes which are better for your caterpillar. Right now it's just pretty. 

Hope you enjoy!
